Text.Page:
You must have made it through the Temple of Temerity! Congratulations!

We badge merchants have customized new items for you! Have a look!

Bring the dire badges you received and trade me for level 58 uncommon glyphs designed specifically for warriors, slayers, berserkers, and lancers!

Sorcerers, archers, priests, or mystics should speak to my colleague, Dasken.
